namespace RouteLink.Generators.Tests
{
    public static partial class Routes
    {
        public const char PathSeparator = '/';

        private static int ComputeLength(string?[] segments)
        {
            var length = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < segments.Length; i++)
            {
                var segment = segments[i];
                length += segment != null ? segment.Length + 1 : 0;
            }
            return length;
        }

        private static void CreateLink(global::System.Span<char> buffer, string?[] segments)
        {
            var position = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < segments.Length; i++)
            {
                if (segments[i] == null)
                    continue;

                buffer[position++] = PathSeparator;

                var span = global::System.MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(segments[i]);
                span.CopyTo(buffer[position..]);

                position += span.Length;
            }
        }
    }
